item.description:
Lets celebrate HALLOWEEN at Capones with Wildfire, cover is 7.00 for this event. I will meet you in the lounge at 8pm,  and then we can head inside to find a table.

Wildfire plays top 40's and in past years it has been a great experience at Capones. They serve food so if you get there early enough you can even grab a bite to eat before the band starts. Costumes are optional.

Yuck SNOWy BLIZZARD expected for Saturday, please check in before you leave because bad weather will cancel this event

 

The weather is calling for heavy rain, wind, turning to snow around 10 pm....just before our drive home.  Safety is the main thing.....Cancelled!!!!!!!!!!!!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Cancelled!!! PARTY its HALLOWEEN
